experience.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
experience.description: Collaborated with faculty on research regarding distributed systems performance. Developed and optimized benchmarking scripts in Python to analyze network latency across cloud-native environments. Contributed to documentation for open-source research tools used by the department.

experience.title: Software Research Intern
experience.description: Conducted research on automated bug detection using static analysis techniques. Implemented a proof-of-concept tool in Java that identified common concurrency patterns in large-scale codebases. Published findings in a departmental technical report.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
